subject: [Phase 5] Create claude-cache-clean CLI and update docs
description:
1. Create claude-cache-clean custom binary:
   - Removes non-current plugin cache versions
   - Lists what would be cleaned, then cleans

2. Update CLAUDE.md files:
   - Global CLAUDE.md: document new plugin organization, context profiles, claude-context usage
   - Project CLAUDE.md: update architecture section with workflow-toolkit and viz-toolkit

3. Add deploy.sh changes for context template deployment
activeForm: Creating cleanup utilities and updating docs
